member.name: IInitializeWithBindCtx.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes a handler with a bind context.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IInitializeWithBindCtx
member.summary: Exposes a method that initializes a handler, such as a property handler, thumbnail handler, or preview handler, with a bind context.
